hymn.title: God's Intention is to Flow
hymn.category: Fulness of the Spirit—As the Living Water

lyrics.stanza: God's intention is to flow Himself into man. He supplies our every need. He is free, there's no demand. Just open to the flow.
Can you see God's plan? God Himself in man! He is all we need! Oh Lord keep me open unto Thee!
I have come to You. I am thirsty; let me drink! All the riches of this life Flood in me, with joy I cry, "I am no longer dry!"
You have come to us! Now we come to drink! We are filled with Christ Drinking at the Fount of life am I!
Though I fail each day, I return to You and pray, Asking Lord, "Unveil my face. Keep me always in Your grace. I drown without You Lord!"
Though I fail each day, I return and pray. And I'm drawn to say Lord make home in all my heart and stay!
There is a river flowing from the throne Reaching man in every place. All our problems are erased. We love You Jesus Lord!
God flows in me He will never leave. I am now set free! I am satisfied eternally!
